flowRoot.flowPara: hallo alo آلو ālō হেল্লো hêllo হ্যালো hêlo ало (alo) 哈佬！ (Hah Loe!) hola! halo? Haló? hallo! hallo! ha lo? hallo; halloo haloo? allô? Hallo?, Hallo! Παρακαλώ?(parakalo), Ναι! (Ne) હલો (haló) helló! halló! הָלוֹ (hallo) हलो (haló) Halló Heileo ハロー (harō) halloa allô alio? ало (alo) hello hallo! ହାଲୋ/ହେଲୋ (hāló/héló) الو alo halo alô? alo алло (allo), алё хало/halo ¡hola! ¿aló? hallå! helo! அலோ? (ā lo) ฮัลโหล (hān lǒ) alo! ало! !سلام واليكم a lô!

hallo general greeting alo when answering the telephone آلو ālō when answering the telephone হেল্লো hêllo when answering the telephone হ্যালো hêlo when answering the telephone ало (alo) when answering the telephone / friendly (informal) greeting 哈佬！ (Hah Loe!) friendly (informal) greeting hola! friendly (informal) greeting halo? when answering the telephone / friendly (informal) greeting Haló? when answering the telephone hallo! when answering the telephone hallo! general greeting, normally not used for answering the telephone ha lo? when answering the telephone hallo; halloo when answering the telephone haloo? when answering the telephone allô? when answering the telephone Hallo?, Hallo! when answering the telephone / friendly (informal) greeting Παρακαλώ?(parakalo), Ναι! (Ne) when answering the telephone / friendly (informal) greeting હલો (haló) when answering the telephone friendly (informal) greeting helló! halló! when answering the telephone הָלוֹ (hallo) when answering the telephone / friendly (informal) greeting हलो (haló) when answering the telephone Halló when answering the telephone Heileo Rarely used ハロー (harō) friendly (informal) greeting halloa when answering the telephone allô when answering the telephone alio? when answering the telephone ало (alo) when answering the telephone / friendly (informal) greeting hello when answering the telephone hallo! general greeting ହାଲୋ/ହେଲୋ (hāló/héló) when answering the telephone Afrikaans Albanian Arabic Assamese Bengali Bulgarian Cantonese Catalan Croatian Czech Danish Dutch Esperanto Estonian Finnish French German Greek Gujarati Hungarian Hebrew Hindi Icelandic Irish Japanese Kannada Khmer Lithuanian Macedonian Marathi Norwegian Oriya الو alo when answering the telephone Persian halo when answering the telephone Polish alô? when answering the telephone (Brazil only) Portuguese alo when answering the telephone Romanian алло (allo), алё when answering the telephone Russian хало/halo when answering the telephone / friendly (informal) greeting Serbian friendly (informal) greeting Spanish ¡hola! ¿aló? (Latin America) when answering the telephone hallå! Swedish helo! Tagalog அலோ? (ā lo) when answering the telephone Tamil ฮัลโหล (hān lǒ) when answering the telephone Thai alo! when answering the telephone Turkish ало! when answering the telephone Ukrainian !سلام واليكم when answering the telephone Urdu a lô! when answering the telephone Vietnamese hallo general greeting alo when answering the telephone آلو ālō when answering the telephone হেল্লো hêllo when answering the telephone হ্যালো hêlo when answering the telephone ало (alo) when answering the telephone / friendly (informal) greeting 哈佬！ (Hah Loe!) friendly (informal) greeting hola! friendly (informal) greeting halo? when answering the telephone / friendly (informal) greeting Haló? when answering the telephone hallo! when answering the telephone hallo! general greeting, normally not used for answering the telephone ha lo? when answering the telephone hallo; halloo when answering the telephone haloo? when answering the telephone allô? when answering the telephone Hallo?, Hallo! when answering the telephone / friendly (informal) greeting Παρακαλώ?(parakalo), Ναι!
